trans-unit.source: Support for masterless minions was added to the salt.state function, so they can run orchestration sls files. This is particularly useful when the rendering of a state is dependent on the execution of another state. Orchestration will render and execute each orchestration block independently, while honoring requisites to ensure the states are applied in the correct order.
trans-unit.target: salt.state 函数中添加了对无主控的奴才的支持，因此它们可以运行业务流程sls文件。当状态的呈现取决于另一个状态的执行时，这特别有用。编排将独立呈现和执行每个编排块，同时遵守确保状态以正确顺序应用的要求。

trans-unit.source: Support for scheduling celery tasks. The worker is independent of salt and thus can run in a different virtualenv or on a different python version, as long as broker, backend and serializer configurations match. Also note that celery and packages required by the celery broker, e.g. redis must be installed to load the salt celery execution module.
trans-unit.target: 支持对芹菜任务进行调度。Worker独立于salt,因此可以在不同的virtualenv或不同的python版本上运行,只要broker、后端和serializer配置匹配即可。另外需要注意的是,必须安装芹菜和芹菜broker所需的包,比如redis,才能加载salt芹菜执行模块。

trans-unit.source: Syslog server implementations may have limits on the maximum record size received by the client. This may lead to job return data being truncated in the syslog server's logs. For example, for rsyslog on RHEL-based systems, the default maximum record size is approximately 2KB (which return data can easily exceed). This is configurable in rsyslog.conf via the $MaxMessageSize config parameter. Please consult your syslog implmentation's documentation to determine how to adjust this limit.
trans-unit.target: Syslog服务器的实现可能对客户端接收的最大记录大小有限制。这可能导致作业返回数据在syslog服务器的日志中被截断。例如,对于基于RHEL的系统的rsyslog,默认的最大记录大小大约是2KB(返回数据很容易超过)。这可以在rsyslog.conf中通过$MaxMessageSize配置参数进行配置。请查阅你的syslog implmentation的文档来确定如何调整这个限制。

trans-unit.source: Syslog-ng can be installed via a package manager or from source. In the latter case, the syslog-ng and syslog-ng-ctl binaries are not available from the PATH, so users should set location of the sbin directory with syslog_ng.set_binary_path.
trans-unit.target: Syslog-ng可以通过软件包管理器或从源安装。在后一种情况下，PATH中没有syslog-ng和syslog-ng-ctl二进制文件，因此用户应使用 syslog_ng.set_binary_path 设置sbin目录的位置。

trans-unit.source: TODO: finish this, what do do when you get different jids from 2 returners... since our jids are time based, this make this problem hard, because they aren't unique, meaning that we have to make sure that no one else got the jid and if they did we spin to get a new one, which means "locking" the jid in 2 returners is non-trivial
trans-unit.target: 待办事项:完成这个,当你从两个返回者那里得到不同的jid时该怎么办......由于我们的jid是基于时间的,这使得这个问题很难解决,因为它们不是唯一的,这意味着我们必须确保没有人得到这个jid,如果他们得到了,我们就会旋转以得到一个新的jid,这意味着 "锁定 "jid在两个返回者中是非平凡的。

trans-unit.source: That number of long-running, synchronous Salt processes is also not ideal. Like at the CLI, each Salt command run will start a process that instantiates its own LocalClient, which instantiates its own listener to the Salt event bus, and sends out its own periodic saltutil.find_job queries to determine if a Minion is still running the command. Not exactly a lightweight operation.
trans-unit.target: 这么长时间运行的同步Salt过程也不理想。像在CLI中一样，每次Salt命令运行都会启动一个进程，该进程实例化其自己的 LocalClient ，该进程实例化其自身对Salt事件总线的侦听器，并发送其自己的定期 saltutil.find_job 查询，以确定Minion是否仍在运行该命令。不完全是轻量级的操作。

trans-unit.source: That said, sometimes a minion may match more than one class. For instance, in the above example, Ubuntu minions will match both the Debian and Ubuntu classes, since Ubuntu has an os_family grain of Debian and an os grain of Ubuntu. As of the 2017.7.0 release, the order is dictated by the order of declaration, with classes defined later overriding earlier ones. Additionally, 2017.7.0 adds support for explicitly defining the ordering using an optional attribute called priority.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，有时一个小兵可能会匹配多个等级。例如，在上面的示例中，Ubuntu奴才将同时匹配Debian和Ubuntu类，因为Ubuntu具有 os_family 粒度的Debian和 os 粒度的Ubuntu。从2017.7.0版开始，该顺序由声明的顺序决定，稍后定义的类将覆盖较早的类。此外，2017.7.0添加了对使用名为 priority 的可选属性来显式定义排序的支持。

trans-unit.source: The /events endpoint is specifically designed to handle long-running HTTP connections and it exposes Salt's event bus which includes job returns. Watching this endpoint first, then executing asynchronous Salt commands second, is the most lightweight and scalable way to use rest_cherrypy while still receiving job returns in real-time. But this requires clients that can properly handle the inherent asynchronicity of that workflow.
trans-unit.target: 该 /events 端点被专门用来处理长期运行的HTTP连接，它暴露了盐的事件总线，其中包括工作回报。首先观看此端点，然后再执行异步Salt命令，是使用 rest_cherrypy 时最轻便且可扩展的方法，同时仍实时接收作业返回。但这要求客户端能够正确处理该工作流的固有异步性。

trans-unit.source: The driver refers to the Consul module, all other options are optional. For option details see: https://python-consul.readthedocs.io/en/latest/#consul

trans-unit.source: The driver refers to the REST module, and must be set to rest in order to use this driver. Each of the other items inside this block refers to a separate set of HTTP items, including a URL and any options associated with it. The options used here should match the options available in salt.utils.http.query().

trans-unit.target: 该 driver 是指Redis的模块，所有其他选项都是可选的。有关选项的详细信息，请参见：https : //redis-py.readthedocs.io/en/latest/。

trans-unit.source: The driver refers to the etcd module, etcd.host refers to the host that is hosting the etcd database and etcd.port refers to the port on that host.
trans-unit.target: 该 driver 是指ETCD模块， etcd.host 是指承载ETCD数据库的主机和 etcd.port 指的是主机上的端口。

trans-unit.source: The driver refers to the keyring module, service refers to the service that will be used inside of keyring (which may be likened unto a database table) and mykeyring refers to the name that will appear in the URI:

trans-unit.source: The driver refers to the memcached module, host and port the memcached server to connect to (defaults to localhost and 11211, and mymemcached refers to the name that will appear in the URI:

trans-unit.source: The environment defaults to 'base'. It specifies which environment the bucket represents when in single environments mode (see mode section below). It is ignored if multiple_env is True.
trans-unit.target: 的 environment 默认为“基础”。它指定在单一环境模式下存储桶代表的环境（请参见下面的模式部分）。如果multiple_env为True，则将其忽略。

trans-unit.source: The etcd.returner option specifies which configuration profile to use. The etcd.returner_root option specifies the path inside etcd to use as the root of the returner system.

trans-unit.source: The file_tree external pillar allows values from all files in a directory tree to be imported as Pillar data.
trans-unit.target: 该 file_tree 外部支柱允许从目录树中的所有文件值导入为支柱的数据。

trans-unit.source: The fromrepo argument is also supported, as used in pkg states.
trans-unit.target: 该 fromrepo 说法也支持，如在pkg状态下使用。

trans-unit.target: 该 https_enable 参数默认为True。它指定使用https协议还是http协议

trans-unit.source: The include function, by default, causes the included sls file to be rendered as soon as the include function is called. trans-unit.source: The interval and lacp_mode keys have the values set as SLOW and ACTIVE respectively, as this data is not currently available in Netbox, therefore defaulting to the values defined in the standard. See interval and lacp-mode for further details.
trans-unit.target: 的 interval 和 lacp_mode 键具有设定为值 SLOW 和 ACTIVE 分别作为该数据不是当前在NETBOX可用，因此默认为在标准中定义的值。有关更多详细信息，请参见interval和lacp-mode。

trans-unit.target: 该 minion_id 可以在使用 root 路径，以露出存储在ETCD仆从特定的信息。

trans-unit.target: 该 multiple_env 默认为False。它指定支柱是否应将顶级文件夹解释为支柱环境（请参见下面的模式部分）。

trans-unit.source: The name parameter can be used to further differentiate between two remotes with the same URL and branch. When using two remotes with the same URL, the name option is required.
trans-unit.target: 该 name 参数可以使用相同的URL和分支来进一步区分2个遥控器之间。当使用两个具有相同URL的遥控器时，必须使用 name 选项。

trans-unit.source: The name property will always be included, while the frag property will get removed if not available
trans-unit.target: 该 name 属性将始终被列入，而 frag 属性将得到;如果不可删除

trans-unit.source: The name you pass in purely symbolic and does not have anything to do with the grant itself.
trans-unit.target: 您传递的 name 纯粹是象征性的，与授予本身没有任何关系。

trans-unit.source: The names parameter, which is part of the state compiler, can be used to expand the contents of a single state declaration into multiple, single state declarations. Each item in the names list receives its own individual state name and is converted into its own low-data structure. This is a convenient way to manage several files with similar attributes.
trans-unit.target: 的 names 参数，这是状态编译器的一部分，可用于扩大单个状态声明的内容为多个，单一状态的声明。 names 列表中的每个项目都有其自己的单独状态 name ，并转换成其自己的低数据结构。这是管理具有相似属性的多个文件的便捷方法。

trans-unit.target: 的 networks 参数可以用来以确保容器被附接到一个或多个网络。可以选择将参数传递给网络。在下面的示例中， net1 正在使用参数配置，而 net2 和 bridge 在没有参数的情况下配置：

trans-unit.source: The nxos_api proxy configuration requires the following parameters in order to connect to the network switch:

trans-unit.source: The parent_address value is a dictionary with unique_id and address keys. The address represents a PCI address and is itself a dictionary with domain, bus, slot and function properties. Report to this libvirt page for the meaning and possible values of these properties.
trans-unit.target: 该 parent_address 值是一个字典 unique_id 和 address 键。该地址表示一个PCI地址，它本身就是具有 domain ， bus ， slot 和 function 属性的字典。向此libvirt页面报告这些属性的含义和可能的值。

trans-unit.source: The path_style parameter defaults to False. It specifies whether to use path style requests or dns style requests

trans-unit.source: The pillar_enc=gpg argument tells Salt that there is GPG-encrypted pillar data, so that the CLI pillar data is passed through the GPG renderer, which will iterate recursively though the CLI pillar dictionary to decrypt any encrypted values.
trans-unit.target: 所述 pillar_enc=gpg 参数告诉盐存在GPG-加密支柱数据，从而使支柱CLI数据通过GPG渲染器，这将递归地迭代虽然CLI支柱字典来解密任何加密的值通过。

trans-unit.source: The pillar_key field would be specified as firewall.
trans-unit.target: 该 pillar_key 字段将被指定为 firewall 。

trans-unit.source: The pkg.installed state supports the usage of reload_modules. This functionality allows you to force Salt to reload all modules. In many cases, Salt is clever enough to transparently reload the modules. For example, if you install a package, Salt reloads modules because some other module or state might require the package which was installed. However, there are some edge cases where this may not be the case, which is what reload_modules is meant to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 该 pkg.installed 国家支持的使用 reload_modules 。此功能使您可以强制Salt重新加载所有模块。在许多情况下，Salt足够聪明，可以透明地重新加载模块。例如，如果您安装软件包，则Salt将重新加载模块，因为某些其他模块或状态可能需要已安装的软件包。但是，在某些情况下可能并非如此，这就是 reload_modules 所要解决的问题。

trans-unit.source: The prefix defaults to ''. It specifies a key prefix to use when searching for data in the bucket for the pillar. It works when multiple_env is True or False. Essentially it tells ext_pillar to look for your pillar data in a 'subdirectory' of your S3 bucket
trans-unit.target: 该 prefix 默认为“”。它指定在支柱的存储桶中搜索数据时要使用的键前缀。当multiple_env为True或False时，它起作用。本质上，它告诉ext_pillar在S3存储桶的“子目录”中查找支柱数据

trans-unit.source: The provider parameter in cloud provider configuration was renamed to driver. This change was made to avoid confusion with the provider parameter that is used in cloud profile configuration. Cloud provider configuration now uses driver to refer to the salt-cloud driver that provides the underlying functionality to connect to a cloud provider, while cloud profile configuration continues to use provider to refer to the cloud provider configuration that you define.
trans-unit.target: 云提供程序配置中的 provider 参数已重命名为 driver 。进行此更改是为了避免与云配置文件配置中使用的 provider 参数混淆。云提供程序配置现在使用 driver 来引用盐-云驱动程序，该驱动程序提供了连接到云提供程序的基础功能，而云配置文件配置继续使用 provider 来引用您定义的云提供程序配置。

trans-unit.source: The proxytype key and value pair is critical, as it tells Salt which interface to load from the proxy directory in Salt's install hierarchy, or from /srv/salt/_proxy on the Salt Master (if you have created your own proxy module, for example). To use this Cisco NSO Proxy Module, set this to cisconso.

To use this ESXi Proxy Module, set this to esxi.
trans-unit.target: 该 proxytype 键值对是至关重要的，因为它告诉盐从哪个接口负载 proxy 盐的安装层次目录，或 /srv/salt/_proxy 的盐硕士（如果你创建了自己的代理模块，例如）。要使用此ESXi代理模块，请将其设置为 esxi 。

trans-unit.source: The proxytype key and value pair is critical, as it tells Salt which interface to load from the proxy directory in Salt's install hierarchy, or from /srv/salt/_proxy on the Salt Master (if you have created your own proxy module, for example). trans-unit.source: The rest_cherrypy netapi module is a standard Python WSGI app. It can be deployed one of two ways.
trans-unit.target: 所述 rest_cherrypy 的NetAPI模块是一个标准的Python WSGI应用程序。可以采用以下两种方法之一进行部署。

trans-unit.source: The rest_wsgi netapi module is a standard Python WSGI app. It can be deployed one of two ways.
trans-unit.target: 所述 rest_wsgi 的NetAPI模块是一个标准的Python WSGI应用程序。可以采用以下两种方法之一进行部署。

trans-unit.source: The root_dir parameter is required and points to the directory where files for each host are stored. The follow_dir_links parameter is optional and defaults to False. If follow_dir_links is set to True, this external pillar will follow symbolic links to other directories.
trans-unit.target: 该 root_dir 参数是必需的，点到为每个主机文件存储的目录。该 follow_dir_links 参数是可选的，默认为false。如果 follow_dir_links 设置为True，则此外部支柱将跟随到其他目录的符号链接。

trans-unit.source: The runas argument is deprecated as of 2014.1.0. user should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 从2014.1.0版开始不推荐使用 runas 参数。应该使用 user 代替。

trans-unit.source: The s3_cache_expire parameter defaults to 30s. It specifies expiration time of S3 metadata cache file.
trans-unit.target: 该 s3_cache_expire 参数默认为30秒。它指定S3元数据缓存文件的到期时间。

trans-unit.source: The s3_sync_on_update parameter defaults to True. It specifies if cache is synced on update rather than jit.
trans-unit.target: 该 s3_sync_on_update 参数默认为True。它指定是否在更新而不是jit上同步缓存。

trans-unit.source: The salt-key command makes use of this outputter to format its output.
trans-unit.target: 的 salt-key 命令使使用该输出器的格式化它的输出。

trans-unit.source: The secret value links to a libvirt secret object. It is a dictionary with type and value keys. The type value can be either uuid or usage.
trans-unit.target: 该 secret 值链接到一个libvirt的秘密对象。这是一本带有 type 和 value 键的字典。类型值可以是 uuid 或 usage 。

trans-unit.source: The service_url parameter defaults to 's3.amazonaws.com'. It specifies the base url to use for accessing S3.
trans-unit.target: 该 service_url 参数默认为“s3.amazonaws.com”。它指定用于访问S3的基本URL。

trans-unit.source: The source parameter can also specify a file in another Salt environment. In this example foo.conf in the dev environment will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 该 source 参数还可以指定其他盐环境中的文件。在此示例中，将使用 dev 环境中的 foo.conf 代替。

trans-unit.source: The thread_pool and socket_queue_size settings can be used to increase the capacity of rest_cherrypy to handle incoming requests. Keep an eye on RAM usage as well as available file handles while testing changes to these settings. As salt-api is a thin wrapper around Salt's Python API, also keep an eye on the performance of Salt when testing.
trans-unit.target: 该 thread_pool 和 socket_queue_size 设置可以用来增加处理传入的请求rest_cherrypy的能力。在测试对这些设置的更改时，请注意RAM的使用情况以及可用的文件句柄。由于salt-api是Salt的Python API的薄薄包装，因此在测试时也请注意Salt的性能。

trans-unit.source: The verify_ssl parameter defaults to True. It specifies whether to check for valid S3 SSL certificates. NOTE If you use bucket names with periods, this must be set to False else an invalid certificate error will be thrown (issue #12200).
trans-unit.target: 该 verify_ssl 参数默认为True。它指定是否检查有效的S3 SSL证书。注意如果您将存储桶名称与句点一起使用，则必须将其设置为False，否则将引发无效的证书错误（问题＃12200）。

trans-unit.source: The report_failures, report_changes, and report_everything flags provide filtering of the results. If you want an email to be sent every time, then report_everything is your choice. If you want to be notified only when changes were successfully made use report_changes. And report_failures will generate an email if there were failures.
trans-unit.target: 的report_failures，report_changes和report_everything标志提供过滤的结果。如果您希望每次发送一封电子邮件，那么report_everything是您的选择。如果仅在成功完成更改后才希望收到通知，请使用report_changes。如果出现故障，report_failures将生成一封电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: The CherryPy server is a production-ready, threading HTTP server written in Python. Because it makes use of a thread pool to process HTTP requests it is not ideally suited to maintaining large numbers of concurrent, synchronous connections. On moderate hardware with default settings it should top-out at around 30 to 50 concurrent connections.
trans-unit.target: CherryPy 服务器是一个用 Python 编写的生产就绪的线程式 HTTP 服务器。因为它使用线程池来处理HTTP请求,所以它并不适合维护大量的并发、同步连接。在默认设置的中等硬件上,它的最高连接数应该在30到50个并发连接左右。

trans-unit.source: The DNs are mapped to a description of the LDAP entry's desired state. These LDAP entry descriptions are themselves iterables of dicts. Each dict in the iterable is processed in order. They contain directives controlling the entry's state. The key names the directive type and the value is state information for the directive. The specific structure of the state information depends on the directive type.
trans-unit.target: DNs被映射到LDAP条目所需状态的描述上。这些LDAP条目描述本身就是dict的迭代。迭代表中的每一个dict都是按顺序处理的,它们包含控制条目状态的指令。它们包含控制条目状态的指令。键命名指令类型,值是指令的状态信息。状态信息的具体结构取决于指令类型。

trans-unit.source: The Display Name is what is displayed in Windows when services.msc is executed. Each Display Name has an associated Service Name which is the actual name of the service. This function allows you to discover the Service Name by returning a dictionary of Display Names and Service Names, or filter by adding arguments of Display Names.
trans-unit.target: 显示名称是执行services.msc时在Windows中显示的内容。每个显示名都有一个相关联的服务名,也就是服务的实际名称。这个函数允许你通过返回显示名称和服务名称的字典来发现服务名称,或者通过添加显示名称的参数来过滤。

If this parameter is specified, the cache cluster is added to the specified replication group as a read replica; otherwise, the cache cluster is a standalone primary that is not part of any replication group. If the specified replication group is Multi-AZ enabled and the Availability Zone is not specified, the cache cluster is created in Availability Zones that provide the best spread of read replicas across Availability Zones.

trans-unit.target: 盐的使用环境

trans-unit.source: The Salt fileserver caches the files/directories/symlinks for each fileserver backend and environment as they are requested. This is done to help the fileserver scale better. Without this caching, when hundreds/thousands of minions simultaneously ask the master what files are available, this would cause the master's CPU load to spike as it obtains the same information separately for each minion.
trans-unit.target: Salt文件服务器在请求时,会缓存每个文件服务器后端和环境的文件/目录/链接。这样做是为了帮助文件服务器更好的扩展。如果没有这种缓存,当成百上千的小伙伴同时询问主站有哪些文件可用时,就会导致主站的CPU负载激增,因为它要为每个小伙伴分别获取相同的信息。

trans-unit.source: The Saltify module is designed to install Salt on a remote machine, virtual or bare metal, using SSH. This module is useful for provisioning machines which are already installed, but not Salted.
trans-unit.target: Saltify模块的设计是为了在远程机器上安装Salt,无论是虚拟还是裸机,使用SSH。该模块对于已经安装但未安装Saltify的机器的配置非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The Saltutil module is used to manage the state of the salt minion itself. It is used to manage minion modules as well as automate updates to the salt minion.
trans-unit.target: Saltutil模块用于管理盐奴本身的状态。它用于管理仆从模块以及自动更新盐仆从。

trans-unit.source: The Saltutil runner is used to sync custom types to the Master. See the saltutil module for documentation on managing updates to minions.
trans-unit.target: Saltutil运行器用于将自定义类型同步到主服务器。有关管理 saltutil module 更新的文档，请参见saltutil模块。

If you pass 'System' as the username the task will run as the system account (the password parameter is ignored).
trans-unit.target: user_name 和 password 的组合决定了任务的运行方式。例如,如果传入用户名而不传入密码,则只有当用户登录时,任务才会运行;如果传入密码,则无论用户是否登录,任务都会运行。如果同时传递密码,则无论用户是否登录,任务都会运行。如果传递 "系统 "作为用户名,任务将以系统账户运行(密码参数被忽略)。

trans-unit.source: The default authentication method for local connections

trans-unit.source: The default behavior if the --prefix option for git archive is not specified is to not prepend a prefix, so Salt's behavior differs slightly from git archive in this respect. Use prefix='' to create an archive with no prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果未为 git archive 指定 --prefix 选项，则默认行为是不添加前缀，因此Salt的行为在这方面与 git archive 略有不同。使用 prefix='' 创建没有前缀的档案。

trans-unit.source: The default behaviour is to write the fetched file to the given destination path. If this parameter is omitted or set as empty string (''), the function places the remote file on the local filesystem inside the Minion cache directory and returns the path to that file.
trans-unit.target: 默认行为是将提取的文件写入给定的目标路径。如果省略此参数或将其设置为空字符串（ '' ），则该函数会将远程文件放置在Minion缓存目录内的本地文件系统上，并返回该文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: The default configuration is to run this module using salt-api to start the Python-based CherryPy server. This server is lightweight, multi-threaded, encrypted with SSL, and should be considered production-ready. See the section above for performance expectations.
trans-unit.target: 默认配置是使用salt-api运行此模块以启动基于Python的CherryPy服务器。该服务器是轻量级的，多线程的，使用SSL加密的，应该被认为可以投入生产。有关性能预期，请参见以上部分。

trans-unit.source: The default date format is ISO 8601 but can be overridden by also specifying the once_fmt option.
trans-unit.target: 缺省日期格式为ISO 8601，但也可以通过指定 once_fmt 选项来覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The default for the port is '1433' and for the database is '' (empty string); in most cases they can be left at the default setting. Options that are directly passed into functions will overwrite options from configs or pillars.

trans-unit.source: The default renderer for SLS files is the YAML renderer. YAML is a markup language with many powerful features. However, Salt uses a small subset of YAML that maps over very commonly used data structures, like lists and dictionaries. It is the job of the YAML renderer to take the YAML data structure and compile it into a Python data structure for use by Salt.
trans-unit.target: SLS文件的默认渲染器是YAML渲染器。YAML是一种具有许多强大功能的标记语言。然而,Salt使用了YAML的一个小子集,它映射了非常常用的数据结构,如列表和字典。YAML渲染器的工作就是把YAML数据结构编译成Python数据结构供Salt使用。
